1_60.utterance: It's just a privilege to watch your mind at work.
1_60.speaker: SHELDON
context: I never would have identified the fingerprints of string theory in the aftermath of the Big Bang.

1_70.utterance: I don't think I'll be able to stop thinking about it.
1_70.speaker: PENNY
context: This is one of my favorite places to kick back after a quest. They have a great house ale.
Yeah, I've had him since level ten.
Anyway, if you had your own game character we could hang out, maybe go on a quest.
